std::pmr::memory_resource* new_delete_resource() noexcept;
}}

Returns a pointer to a {{tt|memory_resource}} that uses the global {{lc|operator new}} and {{lc|operator delete}} to allocate memory.

=== Return value ===

Returns a pointer {{tt|p}} to a static storage duration object of a type derived from {{lc|std::pmr::memory_resource}}, with the following properties:
* its {{tt|allocate()}} function uses {{c|::operator new}} to allocate memory;
* its {{tt|deallocate()}} function uses {{c|::operator delete}} to deallocate memory;
* for any {{tt|memory_resource}} {{tt|r}}, {{c|p-&gt;is_equal(r)}} returns {{c|&amp;r {{==}} p}}.

The same value is returned every time this function is called.
